org.gbif.api.model.common.messaging

Class Request<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.api.model.common.messaging.Request<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - content type of the request object

    public class Request<T>
extends Object
    Class that represents a generic invocation of operation. This class encapsulates the parameters required to perform the operation by the request consumer.
